content.title: Change Detection Analysis
content.subtitle: Compare pre-disaster and post-disaster imagery to track changes over time.
description: Change Detection Analysis identifies modifications in land cover and infrastructure between pre- and post-disaster imagery. Results are categorized, visualized, and quantified for better decision-making.
Detects and classifies differences between pre-disaster and post-disaster imagery.
1. Go to Analytics Panel → Change Detection.
2. Select Pre-disaster Layer and Post-disaster Layer.
3. Name your result and run the analysis.
The analysis produces classes of change, which are color-coded with a legend:
- Time Series Timeline → Animated sequence of changes.
- Slider Tool → Side-by-side comparison of pre/post data.
- Table View → Tabular breakdown of changes.
- Hotspot Tool → Density and concentration of detected changes.
